metadata.title: CVE-2024-25742 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel before 6.9, an untrusted hypervisor can inject virtualinterrupt 29 (#VC) at any point in time and can trigger its handler. Thisaffects AMD SEV-SNP and AMD SEV-ES.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
